text: 2.3: Ro 5.12; Ga 5.16; Kor 3.6; Ta 3.3; 1 Pi 4.3Nza fhum, nza zam mba gumgi phorga kav, nza wari won ndavi vuri tɨvi zɨn vov, nza wari wo vuzvugi mbatɨgi, nza ntara zɨn vui. Nza maaŋ muuŋgiap kav, nza mba khesharigi tɨvi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, Fhe Bakɨme nza nzuav guigira ndav shigap nza nzuav vheza bevahegim, ana mbur ki. Nza ana ndige.
